member.name: F:NDoc3.ExtendedUI.ShellBrowseForFolderDialog.hwndOwner
member.summary: Handle to the owner window for the dialog box.

member.name: F:NDoc3.ExtendedUI.ShellBrowseForFolderDialog.RootPath
member.summary: valid only if RootType is RootTypeOptions.ByPath

member.name: F:NDoc3.ExtendedUI.ShellBrowseForFolderDialog.RootSpecialFolder
member.summary: valid only if RootType is RootTypeOptions.BySpecialFolder

member.name: F:NDoc3.ExtendedUI.ShellBrowseForFolderDialog.Title
member.summary: Address of a null-terminated string that is displayed above the tree view control in the dialog box.

member.name: F:NDoc3.ExtendedUI.ShellBrowseForFolderDialog.UserToken
member.summary: Token that can be used to represent a particular user.

member.name: P:NDoc3.ExtendedUI.ShellBrowseForFolderDialog.DisplayName
member.summary: Address of a buffer to receive the display name of the folder selected by the user.

member.name: P:NDoc3.ExtendedUI.ShellBrowseForFolderDialog.FullName
member.summary: Return the result of the dialog
